Title: COV - On-Board Weighing Technology for Existing Refuse Vehicles - AWARD
Description:
Coventry City Council Commercial Waste wish to install on-board weighing technology on the back of its current fleet of up to 9 refuse collection vehicles. However, the Council may require this technology adding to other vehicles should there be significant operational changes during the contract period.
      
      The installation of on-board weighing technology may also be required for other vehicles over the period of the framework agreement. The contract is for a maximum of 4 years with an initial 2 years followed by the option to extend for a further 2 years if required.
      
      This tender seeks to establish a framework agreement with one supplier.
Supplier [Name|Address|Ref type|Ref Numb: [Vehicle Weighing Solutions Ltd|Unit 5 Southview Park, Marsack Street, Caversham, Reading, Berkshire, United Kingdom, RG4 5AF|NONE||No|No]
